EmailTemplate.subject: 5 ways your partner portal can help you sell more
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From getting the word out to closing more deals, here’s why you should log in. 5 Ways Your Partner Portal Can Help You Sell More Here’s why you should log in today Log in now <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com]]> Strengthen your knowledge and your bottom line If you aren’t using your BigCommerce Partner Portal on a regular basis, you may be missing out on key information that will help you sell more on our platform. As one of the key benefits of partnership, the Partner Portal is your exclusive resource for partner communication, support and advice. Here are just five reasons why you should visit your portal:
- Register deals to make sure you get paid! - Edit your Partner Marketplace information to attract new clients. - Add team members by role to your account profile to make sure you don’t miss important info from BigCommerce. - Get new leads and deepen your client relationships by leveraging the co-marketing materials available on your portal. - Make sure you’re aware of upcoming news, events, special offers and beta programs for you and your customers. Check in with the Partner Portal often
We’re updating the information on our portal each week, so check in often to discover new resources and current events and promotions. Log In now <[[http://partners.bigcommerce.com]]>
